On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will continue our analysis of the election of President-elect Donald Trump, the progress of his transition team, and Trump’s policy agenda.

Dr. Herb London, President of the London Center for Policy Research, will discuss his latest op-ed titled “The Discontent of ‘The Forgotten Citizen.’”

Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will discuss Trump’s national security plans and Congressman Keith Ellison’s bid to lead the DNC.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Economist Alan Tonelson, founder of the economics and public policy blog RealityChek, will discuss Trump’s economic vision.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Veteran pollster Pat Caddell will continue breaking down the post-election analysis for us.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
